item.title: mastodon.el: a Hydra to memorize/access it's many commands
item.description: Mastodon has a lot of commands. You can access most of them directly via keybindings, just use M-x describe-mode or the h or ? keys. Some more are described on the project website, https://codeberg.org/martianh/mastodon.el in the README.org But, if you don’t use Mastodon that regularly, maybe a Hydra can help you? Here is a sample version: ![img](./mastodon-hydra.png] (defhydra mastodon-help (:color blue :hint nil) " Timelines^^ Toots^^^^ Own Toots^^ Profiles^^ Users/Follows^^ Misc^^ user _h_elp _@_ mentions (un) boo_k_mark^^ show _E_dits ^^ _B_lock user boo_K_marks _v_ote^^ trendin_g_ _u_pdate " ("H" mastodon-tl--get-home-timeline) ("L" mastodon-tl--get-local-timeline) ("F"
